page.title: 11TRANSPORT IN EASTLEIGH
page.content: Eastleigh has extensive variety of transport{Roadline,Removals,The {Dairy,Home Deliveries}and{Meals on {Wheels}and{Mothers Pride}which are mainly around the edge of town. Freight container lorries go to and from Southampton docks.Bread lorries from the bakery,local delivery vans. Bicycles are used locally . Passenger transport includes buses, taxis and coaches but most are on their bicycles.Their are a number of main roads which are very busy and cause a lot of congestion.We also have a by pass(A33) which just scrapes into the Eastleigh area, so does the M27. Eastleigh has a large number of minor roads and many back alleys where the dust man takes his lorry to collect refuse.
